title: Men's Bible Study
description: A group of men from FBCE as well as other local churches meet weekly for breakfsat and to search the riches of God's history of redemption as found in the holy scriptures. The study is currently working through the book of Numbers or, "In the Wilderness". We would love to have you join us!

title: Women's Bible Study
description: The Women's study is currently working through the book of Esther. If you have any questions please call our church office at (334) 541-4444, reply to this post or email Heather Green at roll_eagle@yahoo.com
